scripts.installProjects: concurrently "cd angular-project-module && yarn " "cd portal && yarn" "cd react15-assets-module && yarn" "cd react17-user-module && npm run installProjects"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd angular-project-module && yarn start" "cd portal && yarn start" "cd react15-assets-module && yarn start" "cd react17-user-module && npm run start"
